Seo.title: The future is electric: let's start this extraordinary journey together.
Seo.description: Enhance your charging network with precise data and global visibility. Join a platform that integrates over 200,000 charging points, offering advanced tools for real-time availability monitoring and user experience optimization.

Hero.title: The future is electric: let's start this extraordinary journey together.
Hero.description: Enhance your charging network with precise data and global visibility. Join a platform that integrates over 200,000 charging points, offering advanced tools for real-time availability monitoring and user experience optimization.

SectionChargeSystem.title: A unique management system for your network.
SectionChargeSystem.description: Freedom of movement. Zero worries. An open and interoperable network for all electric vehicles.

slide-1.title: NextCharge for CPOs
slide-1.description: Maximize your network's visibility. Integrate your stations into our ecosystem to reach thousands of users every day. Boost your brand on the map and attract new drivers to your charging points.

slide-2.title: From card to Plug&Charge: total freedom
slide-2.description: With NextCharge, you can enable payments via physical POS, app, or direct authorization. We make every charging experience fluid, intelligent, and obstacle-free.

slide-3.title: Complete management, always updated
slide-3.description: Monitor stations, sessions, users, and tariffs from a single centralized platform. Everything you need for operational control of your network is just a click away.

slide-4.title: Security and flexibility in payments
slide-4.description: We manage every transaction through secure authorization systems. Whether you choose the prepaid wallet, credit card, or direct authorization (Plug&Charge), the process is immediate, protected, and transparent.

Cards1.title: MAPS
Cards1.description: A complete overview of your stations with real-time availability status.

Cards2.title: Charging Analysis
Cards2.description: Detailed reports and transactional data analysis to monitor every kWh.

Cards3.title: Diagnostics
Cards3.description: Receive error logs and system messages to optimize maintenance interventions.

Cards4.title: Remote Management
Cards4.description: Change settings and conduct maintenance remotely: your time is precious.

Cards5.title: NextCharge
Cards5.description: Customize your stations with logos, photos, and tariffs to attract community drivers.

Cards6.title:
All-in-One 
Solution
Cards6.description: Total control over your revenue combined with the power of the most used charging app on the market.

SectionNextChargeApp.title: NextCharge App
SectionNextChargeApp.description: NextCharge is the technological partner that guarantees interoperability between infrastructure and drivers on a global scale. A consolidated ecosystem to ensure maximum visibility and integrated management of your charging network.

SectionMap.title: Different operators for a single authentication system
SectionMap.description: We developed the Management System with a very clear goal: make everything that a charging point operator – CPO – needs to control simple.
SectionMap.caption:
Let’s charge
Just a few steps to start your first charge.

SectionDownload.title: One platform, infinite integration possibilities
SectionDownload.description:
We guarantee total interoperability by supporting OCPP and OCPI protocols, integrating the ISO 15118 standard to enable advanced technologies such as Plug & Charge. 
We connect your stations to global roaming circuits and industry-leading partners, offering a frictionless experience.

SectionFeature.title: Total control over your fleet's charging activity

chips.description-1: Monitor every session, energy delivered, and costs through visual reports and interactive maps. Filter by date, view station usage, and export everything to Excel or PDF for quick and accurate reporting.
chips.description-2: Manage users, cards, credit, and operators with extreme ease. Track every single transaction and receive clear monthly invoices to keep your fleet always operational and monitored.
